text:
Prior to the merger, the 4-firm concentration ratio for the market is 25 + 15 + 15
+ 10 = 65%. After the merger, the Acme + Blake firm has 40% of the market, and
the 4-firm concentration ratio is 40 + 15 + 10 + 5 = 70%. Although the 4-firm
concentration ratio has only increased slightly, the market power of the largest firm in
the industry has increased significantly from 25% to 40%.
